name: Hold Your Own
description: A multiplayer open world sandbox, crafting and survival FPS game set in an unknown land where you'll fight to survive. Build your base, hunt and craft to defend yourself from aggressive wildlife, enemies or friends. Do you have what it takes to Hold Your Own?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ (64 bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ (64 bit) Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 Ti/960 (High settings) or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480 (High settings) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
